PackageOracle.name: ALTPAYINT_JOURNAL_PKG
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE SOFRT.ALTPAYINT_JOURNAL_PKG IS
--
-- Declaring public variables.
IS_DELETING CONSTANT VARCHAR2(3):= 'DEL';
IS_INSERTING CONSTANT VARCHAR2(3):= 'INS';
IS_UPDATING CONSTANT VARCHAR2(3):= 'UPD';
--
-- Journal procedure for the PAYMENTS table.
procedure payments_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN payments_jn%ROWTYPE
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2);
--
-- Journal procedure for the REFUNDS table.
procedure refunds_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN refunds_jn%ROWTYPE
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2);
--
-- Journal procedure for the RETURNS table.
procedure returns_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN returns_jn%ROWTYPE
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2);
--
-- Journal procedure for the RETURN_REVERSALS table.
procedure return_reversals_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN return_reversals_jn%ROWTYPE
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2);
--
END altpayint_journal_pkg;

body.name: ALTPAYINT_JOURNAL_PKG
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY SOFRT.ALTPAYINT_JOURNAL_PKG IS
--
/******************************************************************************
NAME: ALTPAYINT_JOURNAL_PKG
PURPOSE: Manages journaling tables for PAYON DB

REVISIONS:
Ver Date Author Description
--------- ---------- --------------- --------------------------
1.0 2015-10-26 SVinette 1. Created this package.
******************************************************************************/
--
-- Declaring variables.
FIRST_STATEMENT CONSTANT VARCHAR2(2):= 'S1';
SECOND_STATEMENT CONSTANT VARCHAR2(2):= 'S2';
NO_ERROR_STATUS CONSTANT PLS_INTEGER:= 0;
ERROR_FIRST_STATUS CONSTANT PLS_INTEGER:= 1;
ERROR_SECOND_STATUS CONSTANT PLS_INTEGER:= 2;
--
-- Sub-Program Units
procedure payments_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN payments_jn%rowtype
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2
)
IS
lStmt VARCHAR2 (2);
lErrCode pls_integer;
PROC_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'PAYMENTS_JN_PRC';
TAB_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'PAYMENTS_JN';
BEGIN
p_err_code := NO_ERROR_STATUS;
p_err_msg := NULL;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_UPDATING, IS_DELETING) THEN
lStmt := FIRST_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_FIRST_STATUS;
--
UPDATE payments_jn
SET to_date = p_rec.from_date - (INTERVAL '0.000001' SECOND)
WHERE internal_id = p_rec.internal_id
AND to_date IS NULL;
END IF;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_INSERTING, IS_UPDATING) THEN
lStmt := SECOND_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_SECOND_STATUS;
--
INSERT INTO payments_jn
( internal_id, id, status, modified_by, from_date, ogg_key_id )
VALUES
( p_rec.internal_id, p_rec.id, p_rec.status, p_rec.modified_by, p_rec.from_date, rawtohex(sys_guid()) );
--
END IF;
--
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
p_err_code := lErrCode;
p_err_msg := PROC_NAME||', INTERNAL_ID '||p_rec.internal_id||', stmt '||lStmt||', '||SQLERRM;
END payments_jn_prc;
--
-- Sub-Program Units
procedure refunds_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN refunds_jn%rowtype
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2
)
IS
lStmt VARCHAR2 (2);
lErrCode pls_integer;
PROC_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'REFUNDS_JN_PRC';
TAB_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'REFUNDS_JN';
BEGIN
p_err_code := NO_ERROR_STATUS;
p_err_msg := NULL;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_UPDATING, IS_DELETING) THEN
lStmt := FIRST_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_FIRST_STATUS;
--
UPDATE refunds_jn
SET to_date = p_rec.from_date - (INTERVAL '0.000001' SECOND)
WHERE internal_id = p_rec.internal_id
AND to_date IS NULL;
END IF;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_INSERTING, IS_UPDATING) THEN
lStmt := SECOND_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_SECOND_STATUS;
--
INSERT INTO refunds_jn
( internal_id, id, status, modified_by, from_date, ogg_key_id )
VALUES
( p_rec.internal_id, p_rec.id, p_rec.status, p_rec.modified_by, p_rec.from_date, rawtohex(sys_guid()) );
--
END IF;
--
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
p_err_code := lErrCode;
p_err_msg := PROC_NAME||', INTERNAL_ID '||p_rec.internal_id||', stmt '||lStmt||', '||SQLERRM;
END refunds_jn_prc;
--
-- Sub-Program Units
procedure returns_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN returns_jn%rowtype
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2
)
IS
lStmt VARCHAR2 (2);
lErrCode pls_integer;
PROC_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'RETURNS_JN_PRC';
TAB_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'RETURNS_JN';
BEGIN
p_err_code := NO_ERROR_STATUS;
p_err_msg := NULL;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_UPDATING, IS_DELETING) THEN
lStmt := FIRST_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_FIRST_STATUS;
--
UPDATE returns_jn
SET to_date = p_rec.from_date - (INTERVAL '0.000001' SECOND)
WHERE internal_id = p_rec.internal_id
AND to_date IS NULL;
END IF;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_INSERTING, IS_UPDATING) THEN
lStmt := SECOND_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_SECOND_STATUS;
--
INSERT INTO returns_jn
( internal_id, id, status, modified_by, from_date, ogg_key_id )
VALUES
( p_rec.internal_id, p_rec.id, p_rec.status, p_rec.modified_by, p_rec.from_date, rawtohex(sys_guid()) );
--
END IF;
--
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
p_err_code := lErrCode;
p_err_msg := PROC_NAME||', INTERNAL_ID '||p_rec.internal_id||', stmt '||lStmt||', '||SQLERRM;
END returns_jn_prc;
--
-- Sub-Program Units
procedure return_reversals_jn_prc (
p_process IN VARCHAR2
,p_rec IN return_reversals_jn%rowtype
,p_err_code OUT NOCOPY NUMBER
,p_err_msg OUT NOCOPY VARCHAR2
)
IS
lStmt VARCHAR2 (2);
lErrCode pls_integer;
PROC_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'RETURN_REVERSALS_JN_PRC';
TAB_NAME CONSTANT VARCHAR2(30):= 'RETURN_REVERSALS_JN';
BEGIN
p_err_code := NO_ERROR_STATUS;
p_err_msg := NULL;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_UPDATING, IS_DELETING) THEN
lStmt := FIRST_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_FIRST_STATUS;
--
UPDATE return_reversals_jn
SET to_date = p_rec.from_date - (INTERVAL '0.000001' SECOND)
WHERE internal_id = p_rec.internal_id
AND to_date IS NULL;
END IF;
--
IF p_process IN (IS_INSERTING, IS_UPDATING) THEN
lStmt := SECOND_STATEMENT;
lErrCode := ERROR_SECOND_STATUS;
--
INSERT INTO return_reversals_jn
( internal_id, id, status, modified_by, from_date, ogg_key_id )
VALUES
( p_rec.internal_id, p_rec.id, p_rec.status, p_rec.modified_by, p_rec.from_date, rawtohex(sys_guid()) );
--
END IF;
--
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
p_err_code := lErrCode;
p_err_msg := PROC_NAME||', INTERNAL_ID '||p_rec.internal_id||', stmt '||lStmt||', '||SQLERRM;
END return_reversals_jn_prc;
--
-- PL/SQL Block
END altpayint_journal_pkg;
